verbose_text: Interestingly, while knockdown of PTEN alone increased cell proliferation, migration, and invasion, knockdown of SMAD4 alone did not significantly alter any of these cellular activities (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY and XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY), Together, these findings demonstrate a prominent role for SMAD4 that prevents lung cancer development when the expression of Pten is altered in the airway epithelium.
